item.title: Zabbix安装(这是一个草稿)
item.description:
pwgen 18 1

GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON . TO ‘root’@’%’ Identified by “k22gve2rSgUTArEd”; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON . TO ‘root’@‘127.0.0.1’ Identified by “k22gve2rSgUTArEd” WITH GRANT OPTION; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON . TO ‘root’@’localhost’ Identified by “k22gve2rSgUTArEd” WITH GRANT OPTION;

wget “https://cdn.zabbix.com/zabbix/sources/stable/4.0/zabbix-4.0.26.tar.gz"

tar -xzf zabbix-4.0.26.tar.gz && cd zabbix-4.0.26/

yum -y install curl libcurl-devel net-snmp net-snmp-devel perl-DBI libdbi-dbd-mysql mysql-devel gcc make libxml2 libxml2-devel libevent-devel
